statements: SELECT * FROM Advertisers;
SELECT advertiser_name, segment_criteria FROM Advertisers;
SELECT advertiser_id, advertiser_name FROM Advertisers ORDER BY advertiser_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Advertisers WHERE advertiser_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Advertisers WHERE segment_criteria LIKE '%target%';
SELECT * FROM Advertisers ORDER BY advertiser_name DESC;
SELECT advertiser_id, advertiser_name FROM Advertisers WHERE segment_criteria='High Value' ORDER BY advertiser_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT segment_criteria FROM Advertisers;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Advertisers WHERE segment_criteria='Low Budget';
SELECT * FROM Advertisers WHERE segment_criteria IN ('Premium', 'Discount') ORDER BY advertiser_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM advertisers;
SELECT id, name, email FROM advertisers WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM audience_segments ORDER BY segment_name DESC;
SELECT id, segment_name FROM audience_segments WHERE segment_description LIKE '%target%';
SELECT * FROM advertisers JOIN audience_segments ON advertisers.id = audience_segments.advertiser_id;
SELECT id, name, email, created_at FROM advertisers WHERE name = 'Company A' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT segment_name, segment_description, created_at FROM audience_segments WHERE segment_description LIKE '%target%' ORDER BY segment_name ASC;
SELECT id, name, email, created_at FROM advertisers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY email ASC;
SELECT id, segment_name, segment_description, advertiser_id, created_at FROM audience_segments WHERE advertiser_id = 'ef56cd73-4503-4aa3-b456-792e23f01d4a' ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, name, email, created_at FROM advertisers WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM advertisers;
SELECT name, industry FROM advertisers ORDER BY industry DESC;
SELECT * FROM audience WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, age, location FROM audience WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT ad_id, title FROM ad_content WHERE advertiser_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM advertisers WHERE industry = 'Technology';
SELECT name, industry FROM advertisers ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM advertisers JOIN audience ON advertisers.id = audience.user_id WHERE age > 25 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT ad_id, title, content, name FROM ad_content JOIN advertisers ON ad_content.advertiser_id = advertisers.id WHERE segment_id = 3 ORDER BY ad_id ASC;
SELECT advertiser_id, AVG(age) AS avg_age, COUNT(user_id) AS total_users FROM audience GROUP BY advertiser_id HAVING total_users > 100;
SELECT * FROM Advertisers;
SELECT advertiser_id, advertiser_name FROM Advertisers WHERE advertiser_id = 1;
SELECT segment_name, audience_count FROM AudienceSegments ORDER BY audience_count DESC;
SELECT content_id, content_title, content_type FROM AdContent WHERE content_type = 'video';
SELECT * FROM AudienceData WHERE segment_id = 3 ORDER BY content_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Advertisers;
SELECT advertiser_name, contact_email FROM Advertisers WHERE advertiser_id = 1;
SELECT segment_name, audience_count FROM AudienceSegments WHERE audience_count > 5000;
SELECT content_title, content_type FROM AdContent WHERE content_type = 'Video';

SELECT A.advertiser_name, C.content_title, S.segment_name FROM Advertisers A JOIN AudienceData AD ON A.advertiser_id = AD.advertiser_id JOIN AdContent C ON AD.content_id = C.content_id JOIN AudienceSegments S ON AD.segment_id = S.segment_id;
SELECT * FROM advertisers;
SELECT advertiser_name, target_audience FROM advertisers WHERE advertiser_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT ad_content, ad_type FROM ads WHERE ad_owner_uuid = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY ad_type DESC;
SELECT segment_name, audience_criteria FROM segments WHERE segment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, user_location FROM audience_data WHERE user_interests LIKE '%technology%';
SELECT * FROM advertisers WHERE advertiser_name = 'Nike';
SELECT advertiser_name, target_audience FROM advertisers WHERE target_audience LIKE '%sports%';
SELECT ad_content FROM ads WHERE ad_type = 'video' ORDER BY ad_owner_uuid DESC;
SELECT segment_name, audience_criteria FROM segments WHERE segment_name = 'Fitness' OR segment_name = 'Health';
SELECT * FROM audience_data WHERE user_location = 'New York' AND user_interests LIKE '%technology%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
